pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Administrations Adaptive Testing // Provides an extension of the shadow-test approach to computerized adaptive testing (CAT) implemented in the 'TestDesign' package for the assessment framework involving multiple tests administered periodically throughout the year. This framework is referred to as the Multiple Administrations Adaptive Testing (MAAT) and supports multiple item pools vertically scaled and multiple phases (stages) of CAT within each test. Between phases and tests, transitioning from one item pool (and associated constraints) to another is allowed as deemed necessary to enhance the quality of measurement.
